channel.title: PortForwarding With Netgear? Please Help!?
channel.description: Well ive been editing at my source alot and decided i wanted others to come onto my server so i read up on the tutorial about starting your own server but as it turns out the router they use for the tutorial is linksys and i have netgear and i'm not really sure how to portforward to the right port, could anyone help me heres a picture of my routers homepage .. Oh and btw my router name is NETGEAR DG834G [img]http://i73.photobucket.com/albums/i211/sly-_-man/MyRouterConfigPage.jpg[/img] Could Anyone Please Guide As To What I Have To Do. Thank You. [br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2007, 06:35:59 PM[/size][hr]Anyone Know How To?

item.title: PortForwarding With Netgear? Please Help!?
item.dc:creator: @Ratchet2007 Ratchet2007
item.description:
@Ratchet2007 wrote:

it has the ports and stuff on that page there just no edit button theres a page that says use a dynamic DNS, i heard you run a server with that… plz HELP!
